derivation.yuyuan_name: via Latin from Greek, from rhodon 'rose' + dendron 'tree'

entry.def: A rhododendron is a large bush with large flowers which are usually pink, red, or purple.

means.word_mean: 1. any shrub of the genus Rhododendron: evergreen shrubs or small shrubby trees having leathery leaves and showy clusters of campanulate (bell-shaped) flowers

sentences.en: The acre of garden is host to a splendid bank of rhododendrons.
